title: Hour 3 - Nick Saban Sending a Message, Chris Simms
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Nick Saban Sending a Message, Chris Simms
description:
Dan addresses Alabama HC Nick Saban's latest comments where coach is obviously sending a message to his team. And Dan talks to Chris Simms about what to expect from Week 2 of the NFL season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
